user_query: I want to invest in precious metals and need the latest rates and historical comparison.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest rates for gold, silver, and platinum in USD.
Fetch the historical rates for silver between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022.
Fetch the historical rates for platinum between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022.
Compare the historical rates of silver and platinum and present the findings.
